warnings.ieNotSupported: Sorry, this site will not work properly with
warnings.upgradePrompt: Please upgrade to a modern, secure browser:

notice.title: Notice
notice.cartClosesInfo: When the cart closes all items in your cart become your order and are sent to producers to harvest, pick and pack.
notice.paymentCommitment: You are committing to pay for the items in your cart at pick up time.

password.resetInstructions: Please enter your {{name}} username. Reset instructions will be sent to the e-mail addresses associated with your account.

member.contactToChange: Contact {{name}} to change your EBT status, or to become a producer or volunteer.
member.balanceExplanation: Positive balances are owed to the market. Negative balances are owed by the market. Any payments you send will be subtracted from this balance 7-10 days after {{name}} receives them.
member.memberFeeInfo: Your initial membership fee of {{init}} is due when you place your first order. After that, {{renew}} is due yearly.
member.memberFeeInfoProducer: Your initial membership fee of {{init}} is due when you place your first order, or when you sell your first product. After that, {{renew}} is due yearly.
member.noPaymentDue: You do not owe a payment at this time.
member.doNotReload: Do not reload the page, please!

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: This page lists shopper invoices, payments, adjustments, and other credits or debits to your {{name}} account
transactions.reversalNotAvailable: Reversal not available for this transaction type
transactions.mustEnterNonZeroAmount: You must enter at least one non-zero amount.
transactions.mustEnterPositiveAmount: You must enter a positive non-zero amount.

producers.clickToLearn: Click below to learn more about each producer, and to see products.

producer.catalogHelp: Use the catalog to create products and varieties before shopping starts. Use the inventory to manage quantities and shopper notes during shopping.
producer.balanceExplanation: Positive balances are owed to the market. Negative balances are owed by the market. Any payments you send will be subtracted from this balance 7-10 days after {{name}} receives them.
producer.earningsPosted: Web producer earnings are posted at the end of the delivery window.

admin.searchHintAny: Members matching any of the above criteria will be returned, with records matching more criteria sorted to the front. For fewer results, supply fewer criteria. Leave all fields blank to list all members.
admin.searchHintAll: Members matching all these criteria will be returned. For fewer results, check more boxes.
admin.producerSearchHintAny: Producers matching any of the above criteria will be returned, with records matching more criteria sorted to the front. For fewer results, supply fewer criteria. Leave all fields blank to list all producers.
admin.producerSearchHintAll: Producers matching all these criteria will be returned. For fewer results, check more boxes.

cashier.transactionSearchHint: Transactions matching all of the above criteria will be returned. For fewer results, add more criteria. Leave all fields blank to list all transactions.
cashier.addTransactionHint: To add a transaction, find the member with Member Admin or Producer Admin, then click Add member transaction or Add producer transaction.

siteAdmin.siteManagementHelp: Edit your market site parameters, such as name, logo and business information. After you are done with editing, please make sure to press the refresh button in this section for the changes to take action.

distribution.deliveryDistanceHint: Delivery distances should be set for home-delivery shoppers before they are checked-out. No mileage fees will be assessed to shoppers with unset distances.

onsite.managedInventoryHelp: Managed inventory is labeled by {{name}} staff, stored at {{name}}, and checked-in by {{name}} staff on behalf of original producers.
onsite.onSiteStoreHelp: To process an on-site retail or Wholesale order, click On-site cart and scan the items.

product.varietyExplanation: Every product contains one or more varieties, which are distinct flavors and sizes that share general product characteristics, such as description and image. Varieties have their own prices and inventory quantities.
product.mustDefineVariety: You must define one variety now. You can add more later, after you have added the product.
product.cannotChangeStorageDuringDelivery: You cannot change the storage during the delivery cycle
product.onlyStaffCanChange: Only staff can change this setting.
product.mustSelectCategoriesBeforeEdit: You must select one or more product categories in your producer registration before you edit a product.

distinguishedMembers.title: Distinguished members
distinguishedMembers.subtitle: Meet the members who go above and beyond in supporting our community.
distinguishedMembers.noMembers: No distinguished members have been identified yet. Check back soon!

acknowledgments.title: Acknowledgments
acknowledgments.openSource: jQuery, Bootstrap, and more than a dozen server-side libraries, all open source.
acknowledgments.shoppingApp: Shopping App open-sourcing project in collaboration with Neonjelly Studio.
acknowledgments.onlineShopping: Online Shopping Cart development and open sourcing fund supported by Cultivate: Local Food Connections and made possible in part by the USDA Farmers Market Promotion Program.
acknowledgments.donations: Donations to support our open source work can be made at

cartSummary.cartOpensOn: You will be able to shop when the cart opens on
cartSummary.noteDenied: Sorry, the producer cannot honor this request.
cartSummary.noteRemoveOption: You can remove the item, you can delete the note and receive the item without the processing you requested, or you can try a different note.
cartSummary.saveReminder: Be sure to click the Save button after changing location, quantities, or notes. Your order will be placed automatically at
cartSummary.noAddRemove: You may not add or remove items after that time.
cartSummary.noteInfo: You can add a note to most items to request special processing from the producer, but the note will be 'denied' if the producer cannot meet your request. You must remove the denied item if you no longer want it. Notes create extra work for producers and staff, so please do not use them to say 'thank you'. Click the producer name and send an e-mail instead!
cartSummary.weightedEstimate: Weighted item subtotals are estimates. The final price will be determined by the actual weight of these items.

shelvingPrep.title: Shelving prep
shelvingPrep.description: This page displays promised web order quantities for the current cycle, grouped by producer, so that shelf labels can be placed in distribution storage areas.

cycleSummary.title: Cycle summary
cycleSummary.description: This page displays item counts and nominal web sales by item fulfillment status, so that shopping and fulfillment progress can be tracked as the cycle progresses. Nominal sales are 'in cart' values, before producer or shopper fees have been assessed.

flashMessages.cannotPrepareShelvesShoppingOpen: Cannot prepare shelves! The shopping window has not closed.
flashMessages.cannotAddProductSelectCategories: You must select one or more product categories in your producer registration before you add a product.
flashMessages.onlyStaffCanChange: Only {{name}} staff can change this setting.
flashMessages.onlyWholesaleCanChange: Only wholesale producers can change this setting.
flashMessages.onlyStaffCanChangeThis: Only staff can change this setting.
flashMessages.onlyStaffOrWholesale: Only staff or wholesale producer can change this setting.

registration.contactForHelp: Please contact {{name}} if you need help.
registration.mustAcceptTOS: You must accept the Terms of Service to continue.
registration.enterLastNameOrClear: Please enter a last name, or clear the first name.
registration.enterFirstNameOrClear: Please enter a first name, or clear the last name.

fulfillment.cannotFulfillPickupNotStarted: Cannot fulfill! The pickup window has not started.
fulfillment.cannotFulfillPickupClosed: Cannot fulfill! The pickup window has closed.
fulfillment.noCartForMember: No cart for that member in this cycle.

checkout.cannotCheckoutPickupNotStarted: Cannot checkout! The pickup window has not started.
checkout.cannotCheckoutPickupClosed: Cannot checkout! The pickup window has closed.
checkout.alreadyCheckedOut: {{firstName}} {{lastName}} has already been checked-out. No shopper can check out more than once.
checkout.pickupWindowClosed: The pickup window closed before you saved your changes. It is now too late to check out.
checkout.orderTotalDiscrepancy: A discrepancy was found in the order totals; it is possible that product or subcategory data changed while you were checking out. You may try the checkout again.

checkIn.cannotCheckInDeliveryNotStarted: Cannot check-in! The delivery window has not started.
checkIn.cannotCheckInDeliveryClosed: Cannot check-in! The delivery window has closed.
checkIn.deliveryWindowClosed: The delivery window closed before you saved your changes. It is now too late to check-in. Any items not checked-in have been marked 'truant'.
checkIn.inventoryUpdatedDuringCheckIn: The inventory for one or more items was updated while you were checking-in. Some quantities or notes have changed. You must restart the check-in.

memberStatus.cannotChangeOwnStaffStatus: You cannot change your own staff status.
memberStatus.onlyManagersCanChangeStaffStatus: Only {{name}} managers can change the staff status.
memberStatus.statusUpdated: The member status has been updated.

passwordChange.cannotChangeWhileImpersonating: You cannot change the password while impersonating a member.

passwordReset.requestNewResetEmail: Please request a new reset e-mail or contact {{name}} for help.
passwordReset.passwordChangedLoginNow: Your password has been changed. You may now login.
passwordReset.checkSpamFolder: If it doesn't arrive within ten minutes, check your spam folder. If you do not find it, double-check your username.

producerStatus.mustCompleteRegistration: You must complete the producer registration before using that page.
producerStatus.unapprovedCannotBeWholesale: Unapproved producers cannot be approved for wholesale.
producerStatus.statusUpdated: The producer status has been updated.

producerRegistration.contactToBecome: You must contact {{name}} if you wish to become a producer.
producerRegistration.alreadyRegistered: You have already registered as a producer.
producerRegistration.mustAffirmTerms: You must affirm the Terms and Agreements to continue.
producerRegistration.mustSelectCategory: You must select at least one product category.
producerRegistration.willReceiveEmail: You will receive an e-mail when your registration has been reviewed.

cycleTimes.cycleDataOutOfDate: That cycle data is out of date. Refresh the page and try again.
cycleTimes.shoppingStartMustExceedCycleStart: The shopping start must equal or exceed the cycle start.
cycleTimes.shoppingEndMustExceedStart: The shopping end must exceed the shopping start.
cycleTimes.deliveryStartMustExceedShoppingEnd: The delivery start must equal or exceed the shopping end.
cycleTimes.deliveryEndMustExceedStart: The delivery end must exceed the pickup start.
cycleTimes.pickupStartMustExceedDeliveryEnd: The pickup start must equal or exceed the delivery end.
cycleTimes.pickupEndMustExceedStart: The pickup end must exceed the pickup start.
cycleTimes.cycleEndMustExceedPickupEnd: The cycle end must equal or exceed the pickup end.
cycleTimes.cycleMustBeMinDays: The cycle must be at least {{days}} days long.
cycleTimes.passedTimesNotChanged: However, any of the original times that passed while the page was open have not been changed. Please check the values before you go.

inventory.cannotChangeWebInventoryDuringDelivery: You cannot change the current web inventory during the delivery cycle
inventory.nonStaffCannotSetManagedQuantities: Non-staff cannot set managed offer quantities.
inventory.cannotChangeQuantitiesAfterCheckIn: You cannot change quantities during the delivery window after you have checked-in. You can update your next-cycle quantities when the delivery window closes.
inventory.cannotChangeNoteDenialAfterCheckIn: You cannot change note denial statuses after you have checked-in.
inventory.noteCannotBeHonored: The note you added to $NameProductVty cannot be honored by the producer.
inventory.pleaseRemoveItemIfUnwanted: Please remove the item from your cart if you no longer want it.
inventory.noteWillBeHonoredAfterAll: The note you added to $NameProductVty will be honored by the producer after all.

memberRegistration.enterLastNameOrClearFirst: Please enter a last name, or clear the first name.
memberRegistration.enterFirstNameOrClearLast: Please enter a first name, or clear the last name.
memberRegistration.emailUpdatedBody: {{firstName}} {{lastName}} has updated their email address to {{email}}.

producerAbout.aboutDataUpdated: The About data has been updated.

producerEditRegistration.editingWillReturnToPending: Editing your registration will return your producer account to the 'pending' status.

categories.categoryNameInUse: This category name is already in use.
categories.mustSelectDifferentCategory: You must select a different category.
categories.mustSelectDifferentSubcategory: You must select a different subcategory.
categories.subcategoryNameInUse: This subcategory name is already in use.

locations.locationCodeInUse: This location code is already in use.
locations.locationNameInUse: This location name is already in use.

memberTags.tagsUpdated: The member tags have been updated.

deliveryProgress.cannotCheckInDeliveryNotStarted: Cannot check-in! The delivery window has not started.

pickupProgress.cannotCheckOutPickupNotStarted: Cannot check out! The pickup window has not started.

locationFulfillment.cannotFulfillDeliveryNotStarted: Cannot fulfill location! The delivery window has not started.

shopperSummary.cannotViewDeliveryNotClosed: Cannot view shoppers! The delivery window has not closed.

transferLoading.cannotLoadPickupNotStarted: Cannot load transfers! The pickup window has not started.
transferLoading.ordersAwaitingCheckout: One or more {{location}} orders are awaiting check out.

varietyLabels.cannotPrintMoreThan: You cannot print more than {{count}} labels at a time

wholesaleInventory.invalidDataSubmitted: Invalid data submitted. Please try again.

webOrderLabelWeights.cannotEnterWeightsShoppingNotClosed: Cannot enter weights! The shopping window has not closed.
webOrderLabelWeights.itemsBelongToAnotherProducer: One or more items belong to another producer.
webOrderLabelWeights.inventoryUpdatedDuringEdit: The inventory for one or more items was updated while you were editing weights. Some quantities or notes have changed. You must re-enter the weights.
webOrderLabelWeights.weightsUpdated: Your web order label weights have been updated.

printLabels.cannotPrintShoppingNotClosed: Cannot print labels! The shopping window has not closed.
printLabels.mustEnterAllWeights: You must enter all weights before printing labels.
printLabels.noLabelsToPrint: There are no labels to be printed.

salesReports.cannotCompileNoCompletedWindow: Cannot compile web sales; there is no completed shopping window.

producerEarnings.cannotCompileNoPreviousCycle: Cannot compile producer earnings; there is no previous cycle.

shopperCharges.cannotCompileNoPreviousCycle: Cannot compile shopper charges; there is no previous cycle.

onSiteCart.mustEnterWeights: You must enter one or more weights.
onSiteCart.cannotMixWholesale: You cannot mix wholesale and non-wholesale items in the same cart.
onSiteCart.onlyApprovedWholesaleMembers: Only approved wholesale members can be associated with a wholesale cart.
